2017150.name: Aether Collector
2017150.description:
Aether Collector is a surreal point-and-click adventure set inside an anomaly.

Step into the shoes of Samantha, a new hire at A-VOID Corporation's Outpost X, tasked with mining mysterious Aether from the air in the abandoned Quandary Valley. Navigate a world where reality bends and corporate interests clash with the unknown.

Key Features


  • Explore an eerie, abandoned town and surrounding forest
  • Control a drone to harvest Aether and unlock spectral echoes
  • Uncover dark secrets and face moral dilemmas
  • Encounter strange phenomena and potential threats
  • Silent protagonist in a richly atmospheric setting
As you delve deeper into your role, confront unsettling truths about your employers, the nature of the anomaly, and your own place in this twisted reality. Can you unravel the mystery of the Nirvana Device and survive the horrors that lurk in the Aether?

Aether Collector blends existential horror with corporate satire in this atmospheric 5-hour adventure that will leave you questioning the nature of reality itself.
2017150.supported_languages:
英语*, 波兰语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
